name: Discord Staff Application Bot
description: A Discord bot for handling staff applications through slash commands

requirements.noTryCatch: No try/catch blocks, let errors run free
requirements.syntax: Follow modern JavaScript practices and proper syntax
requirements.discordjs: Use only the latest features of discord.js

events.interactionCreate.js: Handler for interactions (slash commands, buttons, etc.)

staffApplications.customizable: Allow server admins to customize application questions
staffApplications.modal: Use Discord modals for application input
staffApplications.review: Staff can review applications and approve/deny them

github.setup: Initialize git repository and connect to private GitHub repo
